mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO test_apt (id, apt_name, transaction_price, transaction_yy, transaction_mm, transaction_dd, rode_name, street_number, build_yy, floor, area, x_coordinate, y_coordinate)
VALUES (#{id}, #{apt_name}, #{transaction_price}, #{transaction_yy}, #{transaction_mm}, #{transaction_dd}, #{rode_name}, #{street_number}, #{build_yy}, #{floor}, #{area}, #{x_coordinate}, #{y_coordinate}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE
id = values(id), apt_name = values(apt_name), transaction_price = values(transaction_price), transaction_yy = values(transaction_yy), transaction_mm = values(transaction_mm),transaction_dd = values(transaction_dd), rode_name = values(rode_name), street_number = values(street_number), build_yy = values(build_yy), floor = values(floor), area = values(area), x_coordinate = values(x_coordinate), y_coordinate = values(y_coordinate)
